alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued August 31 at 12:58PM PDT until August 31 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY... * CHANGES...Issued another Lake Wind Advisory for Friday. * WHAT...For the first Lake Wind Advisory today, southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the second Lake Wind Advisory on Friday, southwest winds around 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area. * WHEN...For the first Lake Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the second Lake Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 8 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
